ygData.subject: 3 Wizzies?
ygData.msgSnippet: Quite an interesting way to put it...but yeah, I must say it was pretty effective the last time I was in a band of 3 or 4 Wizards in Unrest.  A couple of us
ygData.messageBody:
Quite an interesting way to put it...but yeah, I must say it was pretty
effective the last time I was in a band of 3 or 4 Wizards in Unrest. A
couple of us would cast redundant roots and then it was a nuke-fest! MoBs
went down FAST! It was very fun and a different style of play.

-- Lim'Dul

>Even better if you can find 2 other wiz to group with you. 3 wizzies kick
>so
>much ass. to hell with those worthless tanks.
